segments.text: How are your wedding plans going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well . We â€™ Ve got everything taken care of already .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you going to get married in the church ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Neither of us is very religious , so we decided not to get married there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you booked the hotel for the reception ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . The Palace Hotel . You have to be there .
segments.speaker: S2
